metadata.name: Glitter Bomb Explosion
metadata.description:
Fascinating and visually stunning digital artwork that depicts the explosive beauty of glitter in all its radiant glory.  
In this piece, the glitter bomb symbolizes the power and unpredictability of creativity, reminding us that art has the ability to surprise and captivate us in ways we never thought possible.  Verifiable on the blockchain, this piece represents the limitless potential of digital art and the innovative spirit that drives us.  
Everyone who owns this piece is making a statement of one's appreciation for boundary-pushing and visually impactful works of art.  
Ravishing.  
Radiant!
